caffe2.launcher: Path to script that launches Caffe2 benchmarks.
caffe2.data_dir: A data directory if real data should be used. If empty, synthetic data is used (no data ingestion pipeline).
caffe2.data_backend: In case of real data, specifies its storage backend ('lmdb')
caffe2.dtype: Precision to use (FLOAT (same as FLOAT32), FLOAT16)
caffe2.enable_tensor_core: Enable/disable tensor core operations (only for VOLTA generation NVIDIA GPUs with CUDA 9)
caffe2.args: Command line arguments that launcher uses to launch caffe2_benchmark script.
caffe2.docker.image: The name of a docker image for Caffe2 if containerized benchmark is requested.
caffe2.docker.args: In case if containerized benchmarks, this are the docker parameters for Caffe2.
caffe2.bench_path: Python path to where mxnet_benchmarks project is located. Depends on bare metal/docker benchmark.
caffe2.host.python_path: Path to a Caffe2's python folder in case of a bare metal run.
caffe2.host.libpath: Basically, it's a LD_LIBRARY_PATH for MXNet in case of a bare metal run.
